scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run aws
scripts.aws: npm run aws:clean && npm run aws:deploy
scripts.aws:deploy: npm run aws:deploy:index && npm run aws:deploy:assets && npm run aws:deploy:images
scripts.aws:deploy:index: aws s3 cp index.html s3://roupasrotulo.com --cache-control max-age=1800
scripts.aws:deploy:assets: aws s3 cp assets/ s3://roupasrotulo.com/assets --recursive --cache-control max-age=31536000
scripts.aws:deploy:images: aws s3 cp images/ s3://roupasrotulo.com/images --recursive --cache-control max-age=31536000
